osvSchema.details: SQL Injection vulnerability in Boostmyshop (boostmyshopagent) module for Prestashop versions 1.1.9 and before, allows remote attackers to escalate privileges and obtain sensitive information via changeOrderCarrier.php, relayPoint.php, and shippingConfirmation.php.

description_data.value: SQL Injection vulnerability in Boostmyshop (boostmyshopagent) module for Prestashop versions 1.1.9 and before, allows remote attackers to escalate privileges and obtain sensitive information via changeOrderCarrier.php, relayPoint.php, and shippingConfirmation.php.

descriptions.value: SQL Injection vulnerability in Boostmyshop (boostmyshopagent) module for Prestashop versions 1.1.9 and before, allows remote attackers to escalate privileges and obtain sensitive information via changeOrderCarrier.php, relayPoint.php, and shippingConfirmation.php.

Vulnerabilidad de inyección SQL en el módulo Boostmyshop (boostmyshopagent) para las versiones de Prestashop 1.1.9 y anteriores, permite a atacantes remotos escalar privilegios y obtener información confidencial a través de changeOrderCarrier.php, RelayPoint.php y ShippingConfirmation.php.
